item.title: Image Augmentation Using 3 Python Libraries‚ú®üñ•Ô∏è
item.description: Image Augmentation helps to create additional data from the existing dataset. CNNs can be trained better with additional data for image classification tasks. There are several open-source Python packages for image data augmentation. In this article, I explore some commonly used image augmentation techniques using 3 Python libraries - Imgaug, Albumentations and Solt. This article has been published as a part of Blogathon on Analytics Vidhya. Read the full article here.
